name: Who Stole the Pumpkin Pie ?
description:
DISCLAIMER : It is impossible to finish the game due to a massive bug at the end of the game, sorry for that ... Tell me in the comments what are your thoughts about the culprit !

You are a grandfather telling a story to his grandchildren. But not any story : the story of the stolen pumpkin pie. 

In this little mystery game, you have to find who stole your pumpkin pie by completing some tasks for NPCs.

This game was made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Music by Pablo del Pino

Art, programming and implementation by PixTrick
